content: I've encountered a few pages where the text starts high enough that it's cut off by the top navbar (you can see it in effect at https://zulip.sagemath.org/terms/, but it also just occurred on the confirmation page for changing my e-mail). For terms and privacy, I need to add some text there. But is there another configuration step I'm missing?
@David Roe I think that might be a CSS bug in the last release; we'll be doing a new major release fairly soon so imagine it looks like chat.zulip.org/terms instead
